quotes.quote: The general who wins the battle makes many calculations.
quotes.application: Leaders must anticipate outcomes and prepare multiple contingencies.

quotes.quote: He will win whose army is animated by the same spirit throughout all its ranks.
quotes.application: Good leaders build a strong unified team with shared intent.

quotes.quote: Know the enemy and know yourself; in a hundred battles you will never be defeated.
quotes.application: Intel gathering, reconnaissance, and situational awareness are critical.

quotes.quote: All warfare is based on deception.
quotes.application: Small units must use concealment, unpredictability, and misdirection.

quotes.quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war.
quotes.application: Mission planning and rehearsal determine success before execution.

quotes.quote: A leader leads by example, not by force.
quotes.application: Team leaders must demonstrate the behaviors they expect from their Marines or Soldiers.
